text: Sara Balzer (born 3 April 1995 in Strasbourg) is a French fencer who won one gold medal and one silver at the 2019 Summer Universiade. ==See also== * France at the 2019 Summer Universiade ==References== ==External links== * Sara Balzer at FIG * Le Sport au féminin * Sport et citoyenneté Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:French female fencers Category:Universiade medalists in fencing Category:Universiade gold medalists for France Category:European Games competitors for France Category:Fencers at the 2015 European Games Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade Category:Medalists at the 2015 Summer Universiade
title: Sara Balzer
